title: FAKE PENALTY????
body:
DISCLAIMER: i have not afked for a long time and if i did i wouldent post this.

so couple days ago i lost a game of thresh(salty as **** team cant even get over dying once) and when i got out it said i had 5 leave buster game, so i decided to queue up and it did not give me the leave buster system 20 min, and each game i play it goes down by 1 like normal so please patch this and i swear i have not afked for the past (4 or 5) month.
